titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation concerning tobacco.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: And by the Assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Requiring imported tobacco to pass customs; forbidding domestic cultivation.
"Giuen at Our Court at Greenevvich, this nineteenth day of May, in the tenth yeere of Our Reigne of England, Scotland, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
